text: śrī kṛṣṇa chaitanya prabhu dayā kara more
tomā vinā ke dayālu jagata mājhāre
translation: Lord Śrī Krishna Chaitanya Mahāprabhu, kindly give Your Grace to me; In the whole creation, there’s none as merciful as You.

text: mo samo patita prabhu nā pāibe āra
translation: You descended just to save the fallen souls; Oh Lord, a soul as fallen as me is nowhere to be found.

text: hā hā prabhu nityānanda premānanda sukhī
translation: Oh Lord, Oh Lord Nityānanda ever in the Joy of Your love; Kindly give Your Gracious Glance, I am very sad.
Kindly give Your Grace, Śrī Advaita Goswāmī, the lord of Śrīmatī Sītā Ṭhākurāṇī; By the power of Your Grace we may gain the service of Śrī Śrī Nitāi-Chaitanya.
The embodiment of Śrī Gaura’s love Paṇḍit Gadādhara; Śrīvās Paṇḍit, Haridās Ṭhākur, you are the ocean of grace personified.

text: hā hā svarūpa sanātana rūpa raghunātha
bhaṭṭa-juga śrī jīva hā prabhu lokanātha
translation: Oh my Lords, Śrī Swarūp Dāmodar, Śrī Sanātan, Śrī Rūpa and Śrī Raghunāth; Śrī Raghunāth Bhaṭṭa and Śrī Gopāl Bhaṭṭa; Oh my Lord Śrī Lokanāth Goswāmī.
Please grant Your blessings Oh Lord Śrī Śrīnivās Āchārya;  for  the  company  of  Śrī  Rāmachandra Chakravartī, Narottam Dās does pray.

text: (tava jana kṛpā māge ei adhama dāsa)
translation: Kindly give Your Grace, Śrīla Prabhupād Saraswatī Ṭhākur, manifestation of Śrī Gaura. This fallen servant begs the mercy of your associates.
